Description: Dish. Roses, campanulas, saz leaves in central medallion, with lobed surround, cloud scrolls. Split palmette motifs on rim. Made of red (bole), black, turquoise, cobalt painted and glazed ceramic, pottery.
Bibliographic references: Godman 1901 / The Godman collection of Oriental and Spanish pottery and glass, 1865-1900 (58)
Lane 1957 / Later Islamic Pottery: Persia, Syria, Egypt, Turkey (fig.43.B)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Frederick Du Cane Godman
